title: Forum 84 Low ADV Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Originally released in 1984, the Forum 84 Low's forward-thinking design instantly became an on-court classic. The Forum 84 Low ADV adds a durable, double-layer Adituff toe construction, molded sockliner and a soft cupsole for grip and feel. Throwback style, retooled for modern skateboarding: the Forum 84 Low ADV brings another adidas classic to modern skateboarding.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content. 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather and suede upper; Abrasion-resistant Adituff toe; Molded sockliner; Adiprene cushioning; Grippy rubber cupsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Collegiate Navy / Core Black / Blue Bird; Product code: GX9755
colors: Core Black / Core White / Core White

title: Terrex Agravic Ultra Trail Running Shoes
subtitle: Women's TERREX
description:
The TERREX AGRAVIC ULTRA has been created in close collaboration with one of the world's fastest ultra trail runners, EKATERINA MITYAEVA. It is one of the first trail running shoes from adidas to feature a bio-based thermoplastic elastomer (TPE) plate that's made out of 90% renewable carbon.​

​The TPE bio-based plate runs the entire length of the shoe, sandwiched between the midsole and outsole for lightweight, durable rock protection over long-distance mountain trails.​
Created using renewable carbon sources and using bio-based ingredients.​ 
A blend of responsive Boost and ultra-lightweight Lightstrike works with a TPE plate to ensure high-energy return over mountainous terrain that also cushions every stride to help you keep your pace over technical trails.​
details: Lace closure; Open mesh upper with abrasion-resistant weldings, and padded tongue; Snug midfoot with slightly wider toe box; Lightstrike and Boost midsole with carbon plate layer; Dual-layer Achilles protection and midsole rock protection plate; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Almost Lime / Pulse Lime / Turbo; Product code: GZ9038
colors: Bliss Lilac / Beam Orange / Pulse Magenta

title: Superstar Shoes
subtitle: Men's Originals
description:
Game day or any day. Your love for your national team never fades. And with these adidas Superstar shoes, you can rep it everywhere you go. At the grocery store, in the stands or on city streets, your country's colors stand out bright from the smooth leather upper. And because we like to keep things iconic, the rubber shell toe is here in true form — a classic detail that's been famous for over 50 years.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Leather upper; Molded sockliner; Synthetic lining; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Cloud White / Team Power Red; Product code: GX9877
colors: Core Black / Core Black / Core Black

title: Supernova 2 Running Shoes
subtitle: Women's Running
description:
Who says running needs to be uncomfortable? These shoes are designed to help you run comfortable every time, on any terrain. From a precisely balanced mix of Bounce and increased Boost in the midsole to a new padded tongue and heel patch construction, experience comfort with every step. 

Supernova 2 is now made with a lower carbon footprint of 12% compared to the 2020 Supernova. From raw material extraction, processing, packaging, all the way to the end of product's life, we calculate and communicate its carbon footprint, conforming to an internationally recognized standard: ISO 14067 

To reduce our footprint, we need to measure it. The concise footprint results made available to you, provide full transparency on the complete lifecycle of the product. This is just one of our initiatives to help reduce our footprint.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Boost and Bounce midsole; Reduced carbon footprint; Direct injected TPU outsole; Padded tongue and heel; Weight: 8 ounces (size 7); Midsole drop: 9mm (heel: 25mm / toe: 16mm); Imported; Product color: Grey Six / Wonder Red / Core Black; Product code: GW9101
colors: Core Black / Grey Six / Core Black

title: NMD_R1 V2 Shoes
subtitle: Youth Originals
description:
The future is yours. Go and get it. These juniors' adidas NMD_R1 V2 Shoes make sure you go after it comfortably, in large part thanks to plush BOOST cushioning. The silhouette is borrowed from '80s running styles but the technologies are all modern. Transparent overlays add in a cyberpunk vibe.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

subtitle: Men's Originals

When comfort is your number-one priority, these adidas shoes deliver. They wrap your feet in it, from the pockets of foam in the lining to the foam upper. They look good too. Design from the archives combines with modern influences to keep things simple, sleek and super versatile.

subtitle: Yoga

title: Ultraboost 22 Shoes
subtitle: Men's Running
description: These Ultraboost running shoes serve up comfort and responsiveness. You'll be riding on a BOOST midsole for endless energy, with a Linear Energy Push system and a Continental™ Rubber outsole. This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic —  reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean.

The perfect complement to warm hoodies and hot beverages, they're made with an abrasion-resistant CORDURA® upper. description: The year was 1950, and the adidas Samba shoes had just stepped out on the world stage. The pitch would never be the same. Soccer players were the first to fall under its spell, using the grippy sole to train in icy weather. Next up, skaters co-opted the design and took it to their decks. With smooth leather, 3-Stripes and that recognizable rubber sole, this authentic pair is bringing back the heritage for a new generation of creators.
details: Lace closure; Leather upper; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Grey Three / Core White / Bliss Orange; Product code: HP7905
colors: Orange Rush / Core White / Gum

description:
How could the iconic Ultraboost get any better? We asked that question and came up with the answer — infuse it with DNA from an archival cult classic, the Climacool. Here it is, with all of the premier features from those heritage running shoes, including foot-hugging adidas PRIMEKNIT and responsive BOOST cushioning. 

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

description:
Deciding what to wear to express your mood? Do you feel sporty, casual, chic or sophisticated? Hey, stop overthinking it. Stan Smith's iconic shoe solved this problem decades ago. Clean and classic, these shoes pair with anything and go anywhere. Sleek and simple, they easily dress up or down. Work meeting, art opening or nightclub? Yes. What's even better? This version is made with recycled materials, so you can feel good about, well, feeling good. 

This product is made with Primegreen, a series of high-performance recycled materials. 50% of the upper is recycled content. No virgin polyester.
details: Lace closure; Synthetic upper made with a minimum of 50% recycled materials; Rubber outsole; Vegan; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Cloud White / Gold Metallic; Product code: G58184

description:
This trail running shoe will elevate your mountain game to the next level with advanced technology built-in like solid rock protection and lightweight cushioning.

An athlete proven trail running shoe that will elevate your mountain game with advanced tech you feel in every step you take: newly engineered mesh upper for even more comfort and breathability. Rock protection and stability through a full length promoderation foil. Plus the Continental™ outsole brings the grip you need for different terrains. And the shoe delivers a lightweight cushioning with the new lightstrike EVA foam. It's truly made for new summits!
details: Lace closure; Abrasion-resistant engineered mesh upper; Perforated tongue; Pro-Moderator support; Lightstrike cushioning; Continental™ Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Blue Rush / Turbo; Product code: GZ8888

description:
The 2022 adidas X Kris Andrew Small Pride Collection was inspired by the Stonewall Activists of the Stonewall Uprising in 1969. Together adidas and Kris Andrew Small offer a collection in solidarity & celebration of the LGBTQIA+ community's past & present, honouring unique belonging – creating a  colourful & diverse graphic message among this inclusive & optimistic collection. This partnership is also adjacent to adidas' two key Global Purpose Partners, Athlete Ally & Stonewall UK.

You carry your Pride with you every moment of every day. Which is why these adidas shoes reflect it with colour accents and graphic prints. Every step you take in the retro-yet-edgy style is a celebration of love, unity and LGBTQ+ communities.
details: Lace closure; Textile upper; Textile lining; Vulcanized rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Core Black / Core Black / Off White; Product code: GX6391

description:
adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.

But don't be fooled by their simplicity. They're packed with history and innovation. From the signature midsole plugs that got their start in the '80s archives to the snug upper that offers adaptive support, they're part of a legacy of progress. 

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.

description: Swerve. Control. Power. adidas Predator has all angles covered. Hit the pitch and find your edge in these firm ground soccer cleats. On top, a Zone Skin upper includes discrete ribbed sections — each excelling at a different type of boot-to-ball contact. Underneath, an eye-catching TPU outsole digs in to keep you bossing things. The stretchy collar adds solid lockdown.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Coated textile upper; Stretchy mid-cut collar; Zone Skin rubber control zones; Textile lining; TPU firm ground outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Solar Yellow / Power Blue; Product code: GW1007
colors: Cloud White / Solar Yellow / Power Blue

description:
Originally designed for skateboarding, these adidas mid-cut sneakers are just as good for strolling. The playful canvas upper done up in animal print wraps all the way around and under the unmistakable 3-Stripes. The cushioned footbed and robust rubber outsole keep them feeling comfy. Style them with a sleeveless denim jacket to channel '80s vibes. 

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content. 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content.
details: Lace closure; Mid-cut textile upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; Textile lining; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Hazy Beige / Cardboard / Dark Brown; Product code: GY4707

description:
When laid-back days turn into spontaneous adventures with your crew, these juniors' shoes are ready for the action. They keep pace with all your plans, thanks to soft EVA cushioning and retro-running style. 3-Stripes flash your authentic adidas attitude wherever you go.

Made in part with recycled content generated from production waste, e.g. cutting scraps, and post-consumer household waste to avoid the larger environmental impact of producing virgin content.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; Textile upper; EVA midsole; Textile lining and sockliner; Rubber outsole; 25% of the components used to make the upper are made with a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Light Pink / Clear Pink / Cloud White; Product code: HR1218

description:
adidas 4DFWD 2 redefines forward motion combining the unique, groundbreaking innovation of a 3D printed midsole with a new upper construction and a Continental outsole for extra grip. With every stride, the adidas 4DFWD 2 midsole compresses forward, reducing braking forces and transforming the impact energy into forward motion. The result is a smooth ride with less stop-and-go pounding on pavement. The Continental outsole grippy rubber outsole provides traction on wet and dry surfaces to keep you going in all conditions, and the adidas PRIMEKNIT+ upper wraps the foot with a new fit that enhances movement.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details:
Lace closure; Combination of adidas PRIMEKNIT+ and engineered mesh; Sock-like fit; 3D-printed 4DFWD midsole; Textile lining
Weight: 345 g; Midsole drop: 11 mm
(heel: 32 mm / forefoot: 21 mm); Continental™ Rubber outsole; Imported; Product color: Carbon / Night Metallic / Impact Orange; Product code: GZ6943
colors: Cloud White / Core Black / Cloud White

description:
Curiosity and adventure go hand in hand. These kids' adidas trail running shoes fuel the fun with a colorful LEGO Group collaboration and all the tech kids need to explore. A grippy Traxion outsole offers confident footing for everything from off-trail rock hopping to playground games. The micro-adjustable BOA® Fit System lets them dial in a snug fit on the fly, and a cushioned midsole keeps feet comfy all day long.

Made with a series of recycled materials, this upper features at least 50% recycled content. This product represents just one of our solutions to help end plastic waste.
details: Micro-adjustable dial-based BOA® Fit System; Textile upper; OrthoLite® sockliner; EVA midsole; Textile lining; Traxion outsole; Upper contains a minimum of 50% recycled content; Imported; Product color: Core Green / Sharp Purple / Bliss Lilac; Product code: GX2188

description: What if your most unapologetic shoes were also your most comfortable ones? Well, now they are. The next evolution of the OZ line, these adidas shoes look like the future and feel like pure comfort. Adiplus cushioning offers the pillowy-soft feel, and bold proportions serve up winning style. The best part is that you can wear them with everything you own.

description: Give kids laid-back comfort from the pool deck to the couch with these adidas slides. The synthetic leather upper is practical with a premium look, while the contoured footbed cushions every step they take. LEGO® style brings together playful color combinations for a bold and unique look.
details: Regular fit; Slip-on construction; Synthetic leather upper; Textile lining; adidas x LEGO® logo on bandage; Contoured footbed; Synthetic outsole; Imported; Product color: Red / Core White / Shock Blue; Product code: GW8109
colors: Eqt Yellow / Core White / Green

description:
Bring your Bulldogs spirit along for the ride every time you lace up in these Ultraboost running shoes. Comfy BOOST cushioning keeps you energized from start to finish, and adidas PRIMEKNIT flexes and supports the foot with every step. Attach the webbing strips to your laces and show your team pride.

Featured above and throughout the campaign is Maddy Anderson, a junior goalkeeper on Mississippi State’s soccer team. Coming from Seabrook, TX, she was also a kicker on her high school’s football team. Maddy’s family has a Mississippi State-themed camper, and they attend all her games. She has a cat named Muffin, she’s majoring in psychology and her favorite food is steak. After graduation, Maddy wants to be a goalkeeper coach.

This shoe's upper is made with a high-performance yarn which contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic — reimagined plastic waste, intercepted on remote islands, beaches, coastal communities and shorelines, preventing it from polluting our ocean. The other 50% of the yarn is recycled polyester.
details: Regular fit; Lace closure; adidas PRIMEKNIT upper; Interchangeable webbing strips; BOOST midsole; Torsion System; Rubber outsole; Yarn in upper contains at least 50% Parley Ocean Plastic and 50% recycled polyester; Imported; Product color: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Light Grey; Product code: HQ5883
colors: Cloud White / Team Maroon / Team Colleg Gold
